messages.subject: my little guys
messages.msgSnippet: duh, I just re-read your message, all of yours are boys. Mine were born Jan 5, 1998. So they are not quite 3 1/2 years old. Were you worried about the schools
messages.messageBody:
duh, I just re-read your message, all of yours are boys. Mine were born Jan
5, 1998. So they are not quite 3 1/2 years old. Were you worried about the
schools separating your guys? At least now I never have to worry about that
anymore.
Frances
